name: Dark instability
description:
WARNING : This is a realy early state of development version. It should more be considered as a technical/visual/ambience demo that a true game.

Plot :
You're leave alone in an unknown locked place. You need to find a way out.

Controlls :  
Move : ZQSD/WASD/Left stick  
Look : Mouse move/Right stick  
Interact : E/Xbox A/PlayStation X  
Turn light On/Off : F/Xbox RB/PlayStation R1  
Quit : ALT + F4 ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
